alert.note: Alert for Alamance; Chatham; Durham; Orange (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 15 at 3:51PM EDT until August 15 at 4:30PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Raleigh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Alamance County in central North Carolina... Orange County in central North Carolina... Durham County in central North Carolina... Northern Chatham County in central North Carolina... * Until 430 PM EDT. * At 350 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles west of Carrboro, or 11 miles southeast of Graham, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Emergency management. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Durham, Chapel Hill, Burlington, Graham, Hillsborough, Pittsboro, Siler City, Carrboro, Mebane and Rougemont. This includes the following highways... Interstate 85 between Mile Markers 163 and 182. Interstate 40 between Mile Markers 147 and 162, and between Mile Markers 259 and 278. NC Highway 264 between Mile Markers 386 and 378. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: This is a DANGEROUS SITUATION. This storm is producing widespread wind damage across southern Guilford and Alamance counties. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows!
